courses.title: Social Work Practice I
courses.prerequisite: SOCW 2361, SOCW 2362, and admission to BSW Program.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Abnormal Psychology or Sociology of Deviance
courses.prerequisite: PSYC 2301/ 6hrs of SOCI or SOCI 1301 with declared social work major.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Social Work Practice II
courses.prerequisite: Admission into the BSW Program and grade of 'C' or better in SOCW 3323.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Social Work Practice III
courses.prerequisite: Admission into the BSW Program and grade of 'B' or better in SOCW 3323.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Developmental Psychology: Lifespan, or Developmental Psychology: Infancy through Adolescence, or Psychology of Adulthood: Maturity and Old Age
courses.prerequisite: Grade of 'C' or better in PSYC 2301 and PSYC 2314.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Race and Ethnic Relations or The Mexican American Experience
courses.prerequisite: 6 hours of sociology; OR SOCI 1301 with declared social work major.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Social Stratification
courses.prerequisite: 6 hours of sociology; OR SOCI 1301 with declared social work major.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Research for the Social Services
courses.prerequisite: SOCW 2375 or approved statistics course and admission into BSW prog.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Social Work Practice IV
courses.prerequisite: Admission into the BSW Program and grade of 'C' or better in SOCW 3323.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Field Education Block or Field Education I and Field Education II

courses.prerequisite: Admission into the BSW program. Grade of 'B' or better in SOCW 4301, SOCW 4302 and SOCW 4303.
